benchmark_details.name: ArtifactsBench
benchmark_details.overview: ArtifactsBench is a benchmark for evaluating LLMs on interactive visual artifacts, emphasizing visual fidelity and interactive integrity. It includes 1,825 diverse tasks evaluated using a multimodal automated evaluation pipeline.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a comprehensive and scalable evaluation framework for LLM-generated interactive visual artifacts.

data.source: Self-constructed queries based on expert sourcing and LLM generation.

methodology.calculation: Evaluation scores are derived from checklist assessments and are validated against human rankings.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better performance in visual fidelity and interactive functionality.
methodology.baseline_results: Achieved up to 94.4% ranking consistency with WebDev Arena.
